body.name: AUVON Gel Wheelchair Seat Cushion, Relieve Sciatica, Back, Coccyx, Pressure Sore and Ulcer Pain, Refreshing & Ergonomic Chair Cushion with Waterproof Silk Fabric, Anti-Slip Cover, Removable Strap
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 24 hrs
features: Long-sitting without Stuffiness. This seat cushion features larger gel coverage (16.4'' x 14.9'') and 3X thicker gel blocks on the market. Adopting breathable memory foam, premium cool tech fabric for ample airflow enhances the cooling effect and meets your relaxation needs. AUVON offers this gel wheelchair seat cushion to save you from long sitting without stuffiness.

Ergonomic Support & Relief. With ergonomic & premium memory foam*, this coccyx cushion effectively helps solve the back pain caused by prolonged sitting. The U-shaped design leaves enough space for pressure relief on the tailbone; the temperature-sensitive memory foam offers long-lasting support; the slope design provides adequate support for thighs and promotes your lower body blood flow. *(May feel firmer and less comfortable under 68℉ due to temperature-sensitive memory foam.)

Fresh & Clean Easily. The cover of this back and butt pillow was designed with a waterproof membrane, which protects the memory foam from sweat or urine and stays clean and fresh easily. The seat cushion can be removed for machine washing (do not wash the memory foam).

Safety & Convenience Combination. The office cushion features a double anti-slip design with large anti-slip particles on the bottom and an adjustable strap, making it securely fix to your chair. With the sciatica cushion built-in handle for easy carry, whether for home use or outdoors, you can enjoy long-sitting comfort everywhere.

Built for Daily Seat. This pressure relief cushion (18" x 16" x 3") fits most wheelchairs, and it can turn seats of office chairs, car seats, and dining chairs into comfortable seats. AUVON ensures your sitting cooling comfort every day and every seat.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Waterproof Membrane, Premium Memory Foam, Carry Handle, Extra Thick Gel Layer

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Memory foam is non-washable. Machine wash the removable cover cold on a gentle cycle. Avoid bleach or dry cleaning. After washing, allow the cover to air dry naturally before use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I do ridesharing on the side and or days off. My car has heated seats, I could feel the wiring and was hurting my arse. I bought a different brand and it worked for a bought a year, before buying a pillow and putting it on top of the seat cushion out of desperation.I searched for something better than what I had and came across this brand. I thought wow who better to know what a person needs than someone who's already is a seated postion/wheel chair. I bought both the memory foam and cooling gel cushions to test out which would be better for my needs. My friend was over when the gel on arrived and he was telling me how he's been in extreme discomfort by his tailbone doing ride share. So I let him have the gel one and I used the memory foam one when it arrived 2days later.I bought it in the middle of summet and the memory foam is just that, no support and made me hotter sitting it in on hot days. Tried it for about 10days and had to return it. I asked my friend how his was and he was raving. His butt don't hurt anymore, he can driving wo having to adjust and or worry about the pain, and thanked me for it. I returned my memory foam for the gel and couldn't be happier. Been using it for at least 3-4 months and it been a pleasure. I don't dread getting into my car anymore. I like that cool feeling when I first sit, that it doesn't heat up from driving for hours. Love that it's thick, I'm small 5'2, so it may not work for a tall person in their car (mini van yes) 250lbs, and it holds it shape and durability! This a a must have for anyone who drives for a living, car/van/truck, DEFINITELY worth its price so you can concentrate on driving and know you won't feel all twisted up/stiff when you get out of your vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pain free car trips!
reviews.reviewText: I had been having severe pain in my bottom just taking short trips in the car. I can only assume it is because of my back issues. I have tried other seat cushions with little to no success in lessening this pain, and some increasing the pain. But I gave this one a shot because it is made specifically for people who have pain from sitting for long periods of time. I thought if it could help them, surely it could help me, and it did! I have absolutely no more pain in the patootie or legs, for that matter, while riding in the car.On the down side because if the boost, the lumbar support of the seat is no longer in the right place, so I do get back stiffness and pain in the back when getting up from sitting too long, but that would be without the cushion too. So I will happily take the pain free car ride.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for hospital and clinic wheel chairs!
reviews.reviewText: My aging father had so many clinic and hospital visits while battling cancer. For much of it, he was able to walk to and from the car, and walk into his appointments. However, once in a chair or a wheelchair, he became so uncomfortable it was akin to torture for him to sit. He battled cancer for over 4 years and had lost almost all of his padding (fat) during chemo. This pad was the perfect solution for his comfort during all of those follow up appts and treatments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased for my sister who found it propped her too high up in her wheelchair. I decided to test it out and thought it was a bit high also but the comfort level was really outstanding! The support felt great and there was no pressure on my tailbone, which was the main reason for purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my father who sits all day in his wheelchair & this works better than all the others i had purchased for him. At night when undressing there are prints of the cushion on his but & part of his upper legs but that's from sitting on it all day & he says the gel pad feels a lot better than the others I had bought him.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very thick cushion that feels like you can slide off the front
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is very supportive and comfortable to sit on. However, with it's thickness and very sloped front edge, I find I tend to sit very high in my chair and I slide forward and down as I'm moving around and doing things sitting on this cushion. I have to occasionally adjust my position back in the chair as I have the sensation of falling forward and sliding off. It's significant enough that I'm thinking of getting a non-curved front cushion like I previously had. Maybe it's my short stature that contributes to this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband loves it
reviews.reviewText: My husband uses it in his lift chair and wheel chair. He loves how soft it is. It helped with his bed sore. I highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MIL loves it
reviews.reviewText: My MIL is a grumpy lady that hates everything, but was very happy when I showed up with this. She says she is so much more comfortable in her chair. Says a lot about this product if she is happy! She doesn’t move around much so I cannot attest to the durability. Would purchase again if it wears out in a year or two.

reviews.reviewTitle: excellent for people keep whole day seat

reviews.reviewText: Es muy comodo y las medidas son perfectas para silla de ruedas.
Très bon produit. Merci. Je suis bien assis dessus, pas mal.
